data.scheme_name: MSME Innovative Scheme  - Incubation Component  - MSME Idea Hackathon
data.benefits: Scheme provides assistance up to maximum of Rs. 15 lakh per idea.
data.eligibility:
Any innovator having e-mail and mobile number.
MSME - having Udyam Registration number who have innovative idea can join MSME Idea Hackathon.
data.conditions:
1. For the ideas approved of any MSME/others, 15% of the total approved cost will be borne by MSMEs/others and deposited to the HIs.

 2. However, students will not be required to pay any amount.
data.beneficiaries:
• Any innovator - having e-mail and mobile number. 
  • MSME - having Udyam Registration number who have innovative idea can join MSME Idea Hackathon.
data.prerequisites:
1. For the ideas approved of any MSME/others, 15% of the total approved cost will be borne by MSMEs/others and deposited to the HIs. 

2. However, students will not be required to pay any amount.
data.context: This scheme is introduced to promote a culture of innovation and creative problem solving through knowledge sharing and collaboration amongst industry.
data.objective: The primary objective of the scheme is to promote and support untapped creativity and to promote adoption of latest technologies in MSMEs that seek the validation of their ideas at the proof-of-concept level.
data.description: Scheme provides assistance up to maximum of Rs. 15 lakh per idea.
data.how_to_apply: MSMEs (Incubatee) can register themselves on (https://my.msme.gov.in/inc/Default.aspx) and select their choice of Host Institute to receive the assistance.
data.funding_mechanism:
The benefit will be passed from: Government of India to Host Institute to Incubatee (MSMEs), financial support for all activities will be given to HI only and no funds can be transferred to incubatee’s account. Funds will be released in following two instalments: 

  • 70% of the approved project cost as per below mentioned table, after approval of the idea by PMAC and signing of agreement between Host Institute and Incubatee. 
  • 30% of the approved project cost after utilization of 60% of 1st instatement utilized and submission of physical verification report by concerned Implementing Agency (IA).
data.additional_info:
• The financial assistance under this component will be available to those who have not availed any Central/State Government subsidy for the same purpose. 
  • The MSME Innovative scheme is designed by integrating three components of CLCSTUS (viz., Incubation, Design & IPR) schemes to create CHAMPIONS, where each component can have interoperability with other components during the phases of intervention to enhance capacities/capabilities of champion MSMEs. 
  • MSME can have opportunity to suitably interlink benefits among three components during the period/stage of implementation. 
  1. There are some options of various combinations like- 
    Only Incubation OR Only Design OR Only IPR 
  2. Incubation-Design-IPR 
  3. Incubation-Design 
  4. Incubation to IPR 
  5. Design-IPR MSME can apply for any one of the above combinations. 
  • The financial assistance will be applicable for availing the benefits as per the individual scheme component. 
  • One scheme may enter from one completed gate to the gate of another scheme as per the requirement of the MSME, while ensuring that the original scheme it enrolled for is taken to the natural conclusion. 
  • At the time of applying for the next scheme, the applicant should adhere to the respective scheme guidelines for that particular scheme.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. University affiliation       
2. Udyam Registration Certificate 
2. AICTE approval letter/Certificate      
3. Other/NABL accreditation       
4. Last 2 years, audited annual accounts with the auditor’s report 
5. Proof of No. of students enrolled during previous two years  
6. Audited financial statements of Business incubators (B.I.)
data.checklist_info_d:

data.beneficiary: Manufacturing Industry  - Proprietorship, Partnership, Limited Liability Partnership (LLP), Private Limited Company  - All Locations  -  All MSMEs
